column4: Hey. Any one know how I schedual programs to start on bootup? Like Firestarter and Gaim for example.
start on bootup or login?  It doesn't make sense to start gaim on boot up -- under which user would it run?  You or your wife?
for GNOME logins, put the commands in your ~/.gnomerc  For logins from a console (F1-F6), put them in your ~/.profile
